title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Jul 26 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Jul 26 2021
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1: Clay and Buck discuss the weekend covid news. Fauci: Bringing back mask mandates is ‘under active consideration’. Golfer Jon Rahm tests positive for covid-19 again, withdraws from Tokyo Olympics. NYC mayor urges city businesses to mandate covid-19 vaccines. Biden DOJ drops civil rights probe of Gov. Cuomo over nursing homes and covid-19. ABC Poll: Americans' optimism about country's direction over next year drops nearly 20 points since May.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
